actions.text: Amendment SA 420 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

Amendment SA 420 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Capito. (consideration: CR 3/26/2015 S2014-2022; text as modified: CR 3/26/2015 S2018) To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to efforts to combat the increase abuse of heroin and methamphetamines in the United States.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 420 as modified agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 420 proposed by Senator Enzi for Senator Capito.

purpose: To establish a deficit-neutral reserve fund relating to efforts to combat the increase abuse of heroin and methamphetamines in the United States.
